sentence.Network_en: Fears for the President's safety could overshadow his peace-making mission.
sentence.Network_cn: 对总统安全的担忧可能会给他的调解使命蒙上阴影。

sentence.Network_en: Her new book will overshadow all her earlier ones.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的新书将会使她以前写的书都黯然失色.

sentence.Network_en: Large oak trees overshadow the garden.
sentence.Network_cn: 高大的栎树把花园遮得很暗.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以o开头的英语英文单词 ... overset 打翻,推翻,使失败 overshadow 遮蔽，使显得不重要 overshoot 打过头,越过.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... oversee 监督 overshadow 遮蔽，使失色 overstate 夸张，对…言过其实.
翻译考试常考高频词汇(转新东方武峰博客) ... origin 起源；渊源 overshadow 弱化；使……黯然失色 paralysis 瘫痪，麻痹.
雅思写作词汇分类 - 豆丁网 ... disastrous 灾难性的 19. overshadow 使…相形见绌 20. compared to/with… 与…相比 21.

list.abs: 无,无字的解释,查字典 ... [decisive] 不会错,毫无疑问 [be cast into the shade;be overshadowed] 即黯然失色.
Though life ' s goodness can at times be overshadowed , it is never outweighed., 尽管生活中的美德时常显无足轻重 , 但是它永远不会显得多余.
Economic political things overshadow even common sense occasionally ., 经济政治上的东西有时候会让常识退避三舍.
What overshadows everything else is the castle ., 城堡使其他一切都相形见绌.

while he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ;5说话之间，忽然有一朵光明的云彩遮盖他们，且有声音从云彩里出来，说：这是我的爱子，我所喜悦的。

entry.def: If an unpleasant event or feeling overshadows something, it makes it less happy or enjoyable.

example.ex: Fears for the President's safety could overshadow his peace-making mission...
example.tran: 对总统安全的担忧可能会给他的调解使命蒙上阴影。

example.ex: Her childhood was overshadowed by her mother's incarceration in a psychiatric hospital.
example.tran: 她的母亲被关在精神病院，这给她的童年蒙上了阴影。

entry.tran: 使黯然失色；使相形见绌；使显得无足轻重
entry.def: If you are overshadowed by a person or thing, you are less successful, important, or impressive than they are.

example.ex: Hester is overshadowed by her younger and more attractive sister.
example.tran: 赫斯特在她那年轻而且姿色更胜一筹的妹妹面前黯然失色。

entry.tran: （楼房、树木、大型建筑物等）遮蔽，遮挡
entry.def: If one building, tree, or large structure overshadows another, it stands near it, is much taller than it, and casts a shadow over it.

example.ex: He also designed one of the Edinburgh University towers that overshadows George Square...
example.tran: 他还设计了爱丁堡大学一座投影于乔治广场的塔楼。

example.ex: She said stations should be in the open, near housing, not overshadowed by trees or walls.
example.tran: 她说车站应该建在住宅区附近的开阔地带，而不应为树木或墙壁所遮挡。

sentences.sentence: "This problem overshadows our lives right now"
"This year's debt dwarves that of last year"

auth_sentence.content: The controversy threatens to overshadow Hungary's EU presidency.
auth_sentence.res_content: The controversy threatens to overshadow Hungary's EU presidency.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The controversy threatens to overshadow Hungary's EU presidency.

auth_sentence.content: Don't let towering celebrity leylandii overshadow better foliage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't let towering celebrity leylandii overshadow better foliage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't let towering celebrity leylandii overshadow better foliage.

auth_sentence.content: Don't let the technical row overshadow that.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't let the technical row overshadow that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't let the technical row overshadow that.

Sentence.sentence: she was overshadowed by her white peers

sentences.cn: 厚厚的云层遮掩了大山。

means.word_mean: 使(某事物)令人不快或减少乐趣

sentences.cn: 他的失踪给家庭蒙上了一层阴影。

means.word_mean: 使(某人)相形见绌或黯然失色

sentences.en: Mary was sometimes overshadowed by the more talkative members of the family.
sentences.cn: 有时家中更健谈的人使玛丽显得黯然失色。
